freeamigurumi patternby@leta toyfox pattern tips all blue links are clickable color change to get a nice color change work last single_crochet in current color as follows insert hook in last st pull up a loop make yo with the new color and pull it through all sts on hook continue with the new color please watch the video at link to find out how to get a nice color change how to nicely close the hole in amigurumi close the hole using a tapestry needle when closing the hole use only the front loops and move around the circle from stitch to stitch until the hole closes nicely please watch the video at link to find out how to close the hole how to invisibly fasten_off finish with slip_stitch using a needle insert it in both loops of the second stitch after the last stitch then insert it only in the back loop of the last stitch secure the yarn please watch the video at link to find out how to invisibly fasten_off how to weave in ends please click to watch the video at link how to
